features: ▶【2 Year Guarantee & Quality Certification】: This NovoLido led desk lamp has joined the Amazon Transparency Program. We solemnly promise that the lamp has passed CE, FCC, ROHS certification, and we provide a 2-year quality guarantee for the lamp. If this desk lamp has any quality problems within 2 years, you can contact us by email (please check the manual) or Amazon message, We will give you a free replacement or a full refund.

▶【4 in 1 Multi-function LED Desk Lamp:】: 1.【The Pen Holder Design】 for convenient storage; 2.【The Base Design】 can be used as the mobile phone holder; 3.【The USB Charging Output】 can provide power for smart phone, night light, usb fan, etc; 4.【Soft LED Brightness】 provides high-quality LED energy-saving lamp beads, eye protection, prevent radiation and long lifespan.

▶【2 Color Modes and Dimmable Brightness】: This eye-protecting Led desk lamp with USB charging port provides 2 colors modes ( warm light 2800-3200K and day light 6500-8500K). Click the switch, adjust the color modes. Long press the switch, it can dimmable brightness. The memory function of usb desk lamp can also automatically remember the brightness setting of your last usage for both color modes.

▶【360° Flexible Gooseneck & Compact Size】: Flexible Hose of this portable desk light can be bend at any angle, allows you to adjust it with ease and to direct the light wherever you want. It has compact size, which means you can easy to carry it wherever you go. Suitable for college dorm, home, office, bedroom, small room, etc. Perfect gift for kids studying, bedroom reading, computer lighting.

▶【Rechargeable Desk Lamp & USB Powered】: Certified by CE FCC RoHS, this rechargeable desk lamp just needs to be charged with an adapter (Not included) or usb device for 3 hours but can work for continuous lighting over 10 hours. It will be the first choice for your family as emergency backup power when there is a sudden power outage.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Questions and Answers of this NovoLido lamp: 1. Q: Why the brightness get dim after several use? Answer: The brightness of this lamp can be adjusted by long pressing the switch, and this lamp has a memory function, which will remember the last brightness. Solution: Long press the switch to get any brightness you want. 2. Q: How many hours can it be used after being fully charged? Answer: The battery of this lamp is 2000mAh, which can last for 5-12 hours after being fully charged. 3. Q: Is it safe to use this lamp? Answer: Please believe that NovoLido lamps are certified by CE, FCC and RoHS. Absolutely safe. 4. Q: Why the lamp does not light up the first time I use it? Is it flawed? Answer: This light has dual switches, please make sure the power switch at the bottom is turned on, and then click the switch to get the color mode and brightness. 5. Q: How to charge this lamp? Answer: This lamp is usb powered and can be charged through a computer, power bank, usb socket or adapter. 6. Q: Why choose this lamp? Answer: This is a 4-in-1 multi-function lamp. When you get this lamp, you will get a pen holder, mobile phone holder, extra USB charging port and eye protection light. In addition, it is rechargeable, so in a way, you will get a small mobile power source. The small size helps you carry it around with you.

2 Color Modes and Dimmable Brightness: Click switch, change color modes. Long press the switch, adjust brightness. White Light Mode: 6500K - 8500K Keep you exciting. It can help you concentrate on your study. Warm Light Mode: 2800K - 3200K Keep you relaxing. It can protect your eyes when you reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last forever! Charge easily. Adjustable.
reviews.reviewText: There is not anything bad about these I can say. Truly, these are fantastic.The price is super reasonable (and they’d be worth it at twice the price).They are portable.They charge quickly and don’t use up the charge fast, even when you’re using the most powerful setting.You can turn them on and off with a switch at the back to save battery if you aren’t using them for awhile, or during transportation, but to turn them off just at your desk, the tap required is super light. It is really easy to choose the shade and brightness you want.Those multiple light settings are so helpful for different times of day and different eye needs.They are stable and don’t tip over even when you bend light arm BELOW the edge of the desk (I am using it to light a keyboard on a shelf below).Ok, there is one teensy tiny drawback:. if you set your phone on it during a conversation, and the lamp is on, the person on the other end can sometimes hear a hum.Recommend highly!I’ve purchased and repurchased these for years—not because they die because they do NOT die even after years of use—but because we have them at two desks, the kitchen (so ideal for sneaking in for a midnight snack and not waking anyone else), the bathroom (our lights keep flickering in there so we use this instead), and we have given them as gifts, or had them swiped (I’m looking at you, Dad).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooler than I expected, perfect for dorm life, but read the instructions!
reviews.reviewText: This little lamp is a workhorse! You can adjust the white light from very bright, to dim and the nighttime eye-saver light as well. It is perfect for reading at night and not disturbing roommates. It is rechargeable and works cordless so you can maneuver it easily where needed on your desk. When charging, you can fold it up so it takes up very little space. The phone charging feature is a bonus and it serves as a stand as well. I did not read the instructions at first and thought it was defective as the light was dim, but to adjust brightness you just hold your finger on the touch pad. Great lamp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does The Job
reviews.reviewText: I've used this product for a little while.I liked that it was small, light, and looked nice on my desk. There are multiple uses for this lamp, including phone charging and being a pencil holder. However, I noticed my phone heated up a bit as I charged it on this, as opposed to the traditional plug-in charge. I'm sure that is implied by wireless charging and likely does not harm the phone, but it is something to know.Also, the pencil holding section holds 3, maybe 4 pencils/pens tops. So, if you want to use it to hold your whole multicolored pen/highlighter/pencil collection, it's not much use for that. If space for a pencil, pen, and one more item is enough for you, it does the job.For being on the smaller side for this type of lamp, I personally thought it was bright. However, for those who are looking for extremely luminous lamps during a dark night, it might not be the one for them. I liked the bright light and warm light modes. Personally, it was plenty bright.It is easy to mold and change the shape, and turn the light the way you want. Again, this lamp does the job and I'm sure it is a good product compared to the other lamps out there. I do recommend getting this product unless you feel any of the minor issues I mentioned are dealbreakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased in 2022 - 2024 New Years Resolution to send in reviews on items that deserve the praise. This light is used more than the original purpose, morning read of my bible without turning on the six kitchen overhead lights. The light is used for putting on finger nail polish, a light to eat by when enjoying a late dinner with the company of a you tube video on the iPad, using it as a stand for the iPhone, pen holder for a quick sticky note reminder. The recharge is so nice, no need for batteries. Awesome product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars 1st lasted 3 years, 2nd lasted 3 months
reviews.reviewText: We love these little lamps. We even use them as flashlights. The light is bright enough on the dimmest setting for us, but we are light sensitive. (We have 2 of a bigger model, but it is a little too bright for us, and a lot more expensive.) The necks bend and stay at all kinds of helpful angles, if you are careful not to twist them. The button is smooth and easy to keep clean. It is sensitive, and only needs a light tap or a swish of a fingertip to turn on-off, to change color, and to set soft yellow or bright white light. The color of the yellow light isnt like incandescent, but it is a bit warmer than the plain white. So we use the yellow. The usb-a port to charge a cell phone or another device is handy. But, the battery it pulls from is so small, we cant imagine charging a cell phone the whole way, maybe just enough to make an emergency call. But the lamp charge does last for maybe a week on the dimmest setting, many hours a day. And it lets you know it needs a recharge by dimming slowly over the last few hours, not just shutting off. The pen holder is a tiny bit bigger than the one on a bigger model, and it is almost perfect for us.But, each lamp broke itself in different ways. The older one lasted about 3 years, then the charging port came loose. The new one, which we bought in September 2023, started flickering in December because the light itself is loose (charging port is fine). We like this enough that we might try another, if the seller can honor their Transparency agreement with Amazon, without requiring us to give them a street address, which Amazon cautions against doing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Led lap so versatile
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lap for my son to use in his dorm.He ❤️ that he can charge his phone and it is touch tone.Lite weight and long neck that can be twisted left and right
Bought this for my grand daughter and it is compact in size and very classy ! She is very pleased !

Lampada da tavole molto carino il suo designer. C’è anche un piccolo strazio portata delle penne. Ho preso il colore rosa. È una lampada ricaricabile, lo lascio caricare per un giorno e dura un sacco di giorni. La luce sia Luca calda e Luca fredda, molto utile portata.

reviews.reviewTitle: A good night light for places that has no power point as it can be pre charged.
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, portable and the flexible gooseneck means the light can be adjusted to direct the light in any direction. However, it can be used only up to a maximum of 6-7 hours after charging . More than that and the light will start to dim. In the beginning I tried using it for up to 10 hours according to the specifications and the light went off long before that. Then the red light would not stop blinking during charging , even after several hours. Since then I use it for a maximum of 7 hours and it is working fine.
The media could not be loaded. Cute and smaller then I thought but will work for my work desk

Prese 2 lampade per le scrivanie dei miei figli.Luce fredda, luce calda, possibilità di ricaricare tramite usb tablet,cellulare e altro... basta caricare la lampada un giorno intero e poi ti dura fino a 10 giorni con un utilizzo di circa 2 ore al giorno.
